lightsout.domain

Interface Board

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Klein, Moebius, StandardBoard, Torus

    public interface Board
    Board interface to be used by UI. Board is a square of bulbs.
    Author:
    Tuomas

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isLit(int x, int y)
      Tells whether given bulb on row x and column y is lit or not.
      boolean isSolved()
      Tells whether the puzzle has been solved.
      void makeMove(int x, int y)
      Toggles a bulb on row x, column y and it's four neighbours.
      void randomize()
      Randomizes the gameboard.
      void reset()
      Resets the board so that all lights are on.
      int size()
      Gives the length of the side of the board.

    • Method Detail

      • isLit

        boolean isLit(int x,
            int y)
        Tells whether given bulb on row x and column y is lit or not.
        Parameters:
        x - row
        y - column
        Returns:
        true iff bulb is lit

      • isSolved

        boolean isSolved()
        Tells whether the puzzle has been solved.
        Returns:
        true iff all lights off

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets the board so that all lights are on.

      • randomize

        void randomize()
        Randomizes the gameboard. That is randomly chooses for all bulbs whether a bulb is lit or not.

      • makeMove

        void makeMove(int x,
            int y)
        Toggles a bulb on row x, column y and it's four neighbours.
        Parameters:
        x - row
        y - column

      • size

        int size()
        Gives the length of the side of the board.
        Returns:
        length of one side
